com.foreach.across.core.annotations

Annotation Type Installer


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Lazy
public @interface Installer
    Used to indicate installer metadata.

    An installer is a component that should be manually registered into an AcrossApplicationContext with AcrossApplicationContext.setInstallerMode(boolean) enabled.

    Installer components are always lazy, they will only be instantiated if they need execution.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String description 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String name
      Optional name of the installer.
      InstallerPhase phase 
      InstallerRunCondition runCondition 
      int version 

    • Element Detail

      • description

        public abstract String description
        Returns:
        Descriptive text of what will be installed.

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Optional name of the installer. If the name is empty, the fully qualified class name of the installer will be used instead. Manually providing a name allows for greater flexibility with renaming or moving the actual installer class.
        Returns:
        Name of the installer or empty string if the class name should be used.
        Default:
        ""

      • version

        public abstract int version
        Returns:
        Version number of the installer. Increment to enforce a new run of the same installer. Default value: 1
        Default:
        1

      • runCondition

        public abstract InstallerRunCondition runCondition
        Returns:
        Condition when this installer should run. Default value: VersionDifferent
        Default:
        com.foreach.across.core.installers.InstallerRunCondition.VersionDifferent

      • phase

        public abstract InstallerPhase phase
        Returns:
        When should this installer run during the context bootstrap. Default value: BeforeContextBootstrap
        Default:
        com.foreach.across.core.installers.InstallerPhase.BeforeContextBootstrap
